Detailed Description

cvmx_bgx::_gmp_pcs_sgm::_an_adv

This is the SGMII autonegotiation advertisement register (sent out as tx_Config_Reg<15:0> as defined in IEEE 802.3 clause 37). This register is sent during autonegotiation if BGX()_GMP_PCS_MISC()_CTL[MAC_PHY] is set (1 = PHY mode). If the bit is not set (0 = MAC mode), then tx_Config_Reg<14> becomes ACK bit and tx_Config_Reg<0> is always 1. All other bits in tx_Config_Reg sent will be 0. The PHY dictates the autonegotiation results.
